ISSUE.TITLE: The "Page size options" field should be hidden when "Allow customers to select page size" is not ticked on the manufacturer edit page
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.30 Steps to reproduce the problem: 1. Go to https://admin-demo.nopcommerce.com/Admin/Manufacturer/Create 1. Tick the "Allow customers to select page size" checkbox 1. See that "Page size" is not hidden and the wrong show/hide behavior
